title: I Sing the Body Electric!
description: One of the great authors of short fiction in the 20th century, Bradbury's works are read in classrooms all over the country. This collection features 28 of his stories and one luscious poem, with themes ranging from the verdant Irish countryside to the coldest reaches of outer space.Contents:The Kilimanjaro Device (1965)The Terrible Conflagration Up at the Place (1969)Tomorrow's Child (1948)The Women (1948)The Inspired Chicken Motel (1969)Downwind from Gettysburg (1969)Yes, We'll Gather at the River (1969)The Cold Wind and the Warm (1964)Night Call, Collect (1949)The Haunting of the New (1969)I Sing the Body Electric! (1969)The Tombling Day (1952)Any Friend of Nicholas Nickleby's Is a Friend of Mine (1966)Heavy-Set (1964)The Man in the Rorschach Shirt (1966)Henry the Ninth (1969)The Lost City of Mars (1967)Christus Apollo (1969) (poem)
author: Ray Bradbury
